title: Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Permits Activities which are not part of the park's normal operation (such as professional filming, organization meetings, and 1st Amendment activities) require a Special Use Permit. Please contact a park representative at 314-842-1867 for more information. Note: Due to temporary exhibits and other park activities, certain facilities may be unavailable. Reservations Entrance into the site is free. Visits inside the Main House are also free;however, tickets (time-specific "calling cards") are required, and are available at the Visitor Center. Advanced reservations are strongly recommended for groups of 10 or more. Call (314)842-1867 to make reservations, as well as for additional information and specific details about group program offerings.
